name: Self Tan Supru00eame Violet Bronzing Mousse
categories: Bath & Body, Self Tanners, For Body
about: What it is:u00a0An ultra-dark mousse that reigns supreme; an invitation to your richest, darkest, deepest olive tan yet...Skin Type: Normal..Skincare Concerns: Uneven Texture..Formulation: Mousse..Highlighted Ingredients:- DHA: Colors the upper skin layer without sun exposure..- Melanin Boosters: Activate the natural tanning process using micronutrients and polyphenols..- Epsilineu00ae: A tan enchanter obtained by optimized culture of microalgae...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The secret to this high-performing mousse is St. Tropezu2019s professional-strength Tri-Tan Technology. The advanced combination of three powerful actives is designed to turn your tan up to the absolute max. Meanwhile, the unique violet-tint base balances the tones of your tan for natural-looking results...Clinical Results: In a test:.- 90% were left with a flawless, dark, olive tan.- 91% would recommend to a friend.- 96% said the tan worked for their skin tone
ingredients: -DHA: Colors the upper skin layer without sun exposure. .-Melanin Boosters: Activate the natural tanning process using micronutrients and polyphenols..-Epsilineu00ae: A tan enchanter obtained by optimized culture of microalgae...Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Caramel, Pentylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Erythrulose, Coco-Glucoside, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Melanin, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sodium Metabisulte, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopherol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Decylene Glycol, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Geraniol, Coumarin, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, CI 16035 (Red 40), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 17200 (Red 33).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Prep:.-Itu2019s in the details. Create a flawless base by exfoliating and moisturizing dry areas, hands, feet, ankles, and wrists....Apply:.-Glide on using a mitt....Rinse:.-Shower off after eight hours for an ultra-dark result, or rinse after 30 minutes for a taste of the good life....Be Beach Ready:.-Your tan will develop over three to six hours after rinsing..-Exfoliate and moisturize daily to extend the glow....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove pump to recycle..-Contains recycled plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WORST FORMULA. WHY?! Soooooooooo messy, so thick, just so gross. Not to mention you look like tar baby afterwards. I was expecting the u201cvioletu201d to have a major difference in tanu2026 it didnu2019t.

reviews.review_title: Goes on black, during and after
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t read this when I bought this, so I was surprised, but on my very fair skin, the product went on fully black. Needless to say my husband thought it was hilarious but knowing you keep it on for a while (I did 6 hours), itu2019s a good idea to hibernate lol.

reviews.review_title: Please read if you have super thick hairs!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really did love this product BUT I am only removing a star for the issue I had.  Pros: -lasted almost two weeks with no touch ups and faded very naturally -easy to apply (I recommend the tanning mitt) -can't miss any patches for the intense purple tone  Con: -my leg hairs are pretty thick honestly. This tanner stained my skin and every single hole my hairs grew out of. It looked like I hadn't shaved at all even after the freshest shave. Had to return

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, but choose the other St Tropez mouses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tanner is beautiful: a deep, natural brown instead of fake orange of other tanners. However, I prefer the express or berry sorbet. This product is strange to apply, gets sticky/inconsistent. I work REALLY to get it even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm pretty terrible at self tanning to be honest, it's usually splotchy and I miss spots. I also used the original version of St. Tropez for many years which is pretty nice but a little bit orange and kinda light. This product however is INCREDIBLE, it actually blew me away. I have a slight olive skin tone already and this looks EXACTLY like I was tanning in the Med for a couple of days. YES it is SLIGHTLY difficult to spread and it may look splotchy, but no fear! If you accidentally layer too much it isn't going to make you look tanner in those areas. I put moisturizer on my elbows and knees and spread it around with a mitt and left it on for about 1 hour 45 and showered it off, it looks so natural and blended it's blowing my MIND. I def don't think I will keep it on the whole 6-8 hours because the color is so natural. I can't wait to see how long this lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of experience with fake tans including spray tanning people for 7 years and this is, by far, the best self tanner I've used. The color is super natural looking and dark. My tan stayed on without fading for a solid 7 days and I had to use a tan remover to get rid of it (only because I wanted a fresh tan for an event) my only complaint is that it's very odd looking right after application so once it's applied I wouldn't leave the house. I also think it would be a disaster if you didn't prep properly before applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been fake tanning for fifteen years and have tried a million, this one is hands down the most beautiful color Iu2019ve ever seen!! Application is pretty easy, dries quickly and smells decent. I was a big fan of Loving Tan but this is by far my new favorite!!

reviews.review_title: Do fake tans leave you orange? Buy this right now

reviews.review_text: This is HANDS DOWN the most beautiful and natural looking self tanner i have ever tried. I am WHITE. And i mean like really pale, which leads to almost every tanner Ive tried turning a sickly orange on me and almost leaving me looking jaundiced by the time it fades. I would highly recommend this to any woman who is struggling with orange tan. me looking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the deepest tan Iu2019ve used. Great color but too much hassle. Just do 1 coat and if itu2019s not dark enough, try again a day or 2 later. It was really sticky and faded fast with a lot of patchy spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't read any comments before buying this and I'm so glad I didn't. This product went on perfectly, no streaks and my color is amazing. I did have to shower after 3 hours because it was a bit sticky and getting all over my kiddos hands which I expected but still tried nonetheless. Im not sure how or why but it feels like I was in the sun all day and it looks like it! The smell is amazing and the results make me look like a coconut! I wish I took a before and after picture and I will next time. definitely don't go anywhere before u rinse off or else it looks like u were rolling around in mud though lol. I will definitely be buying this again! st tropez never lets me down ud83eudef6ud83cudffc I do have experience with self tanner so I knew it wouldn't make me orange or anything since I naturally am olive in tone. I don't think I'd recommend this to someone who has fair or pink tone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I havenu2019t used the original formula for comparisonu2019s sake. I have, however, typically used TanLuxe. This color is better in a few ways. I love that that it goes on brown so I know where Iu2019ve been and where the streaks are. I much prefer the brown versus the usual orange look of self tanner. Now, where I think this falls short: it is a tad bit streaky and it dyed my pores and all my hair follicles BLACK. The streakiness wasnu2019t bad tbh and may be user error, and the pores might go away with some gentle exfoliation, but rn the pores are a nope for me. Overall, I will probably reach for this one over others that Iu2019ve used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: NEVER NEVER NEVER BUY!!!! It stains, it fades horribly, it turns green-itu2019s awful!! Stay with the original!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The application is not user-friendly. I had to use a brush to go over everything and blend it out. Even then, it was pretty streaky and patchy. The color guard is super dark and messy too. I decided to trust the process and left it on for 6 hours. The instructions say 8 hours, but it was so unbearably sticky, I couldn't leave it on another minute. (There's no way someone could comfortably sleep in this) The end result was a dark, slightly orange tan. It looked blended, so that was a plus, but I would definitely pass on this one. It's just not worth the hassle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a tanner that actually leaves lots of color after showering to remove the guide color. And it lasts days longer than the original St. Tropez mousse Iu2019ve been using for many years and thought was the best. Nope, this is way better

reviews.review_title: Amazing color but not for beginners
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many St. Tropez product before! I love their line and think they have amazing products. When I say this one with a violet undertone I immediately bought it! I will say this one is NOT for beginners. It does dry down pretty quickly so you definitely need to know what you are doing! I usually use the glove method, but because of the quick dry time I reached for the mitt to help buff it out a little big more. Overall a pretty great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself a tan connoisseur, and Iu2019ve tried all of the St Tropez line. I really wanted to love this! I let it develop the full 8 hours, I LOVED the color it gave my legs no orange in sight, however my chest literally turned grey?????

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by sstropeztan this Bronzing Mousse. This Mousse was the perfect shade for all tanning needs. I love this brand and was really excited to try this kit. The color looks natural but can be kept on for longer for a darker shade.

reviews.review_title: Perfect! You must follow the directions
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I see people saying how horrific it is. Streaks and uneven tone etc BUT this is only temporary. You was it off working 30 minutes to 8 hours and you have the perfect tan. Apparently people who hate it havenu2019t read the directions.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for POC and olive tones.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wild. I am an experienced sunless fan user  and have used St Tropez for 15 years. This product is unusual. It does not love. You must have confidence in your application because there is no forgiveness get it on straight and fast. Secondly. I have blonde hair and blue eyes. Naturally fair skinned. This product isnu2019t for us. It looks almost dirty on my skin but this would be perfect for olive toned people and POC. The tan works so fast and dries so fast. I wish they would make a green based product of this quality. I currently use the express tan but it never really dries but this one does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this with Iu2019m a loyal st tropez user for many years and I self tan weekly. I was excited to try this new product and I am horribly disappointed. Itu2019s extremely streaky and difficult to rub on, very unlike their original mousse. The color is reminiscent of the girl who turns into a blueberry from Willy wonka. The very sight of me made my fiancu00e9 gasp and say that I looked awful and to wash it off right away. Needless to say I wonu2019t be using again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this!! As I was rubbing it in with Mitt is did not want to rub in! left alot of dripping out of nowhere!! I learned a secret that if your tanning mousse is not blending in or sticky, to use first a blending brush to help blend it better then get a big manicure brush or I used hair dresser one that gets the hair off you and dip in it baby powder to help it dry!! I unfortunately got so annoyed that it was maybe on for 25mins because I couldn't stand looking at the lines!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't orange. I have very pale skin with pink undertones and it looks quite natural. The smell is also very nice and doesn't dry me out like other tans.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So difficult to use. It dries down fast and extremely streaky and when you try to go over the same spot to fix it, it takes off the layer you already applied. Took me 30 minutes to try to get an even coat and even then, was left with an extremely streaky finish that I ended up washing off because I didnu2019t want to be an uneven mess. Also stays sticky and does not completely dry down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love hate relationship with this tan. Itu2019s very difficult to put on and requires a lot of effort to not get streaky because it dries FAST. But it is the only tan that works for olive skin and is beautiful on. I typically leave it on for 4-6 hours as itu2019s VERY dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but I have exfoliated, moisturized, and this product still looks patchy/leaves very dark spots (I donu2019t have dry skin and this has never happened with any other tan before)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hi! Iu2019m an addict! lol. I am 35.  I used to go tanning everyday(we didnu2019t know how bad it was) once I found out I got obsessed with self-tanner.  Weu2019re talking OG FAKE BAKE! I have been a huge fan of St. Tropez self tanners for more years than I can remember.  But I swear in the last year or so the formula changed.  This new shade came out and of course I had to have it!  And I am so disappointed.  The formalist is so streaky and patchy.  And I know the drill- I exfoliate and use tan remover, I moisturize.  I moisturize my dry spots prior to application and wait for that to dry down.  I wear gloves and use St. Tropez self tan applicator mittu2026. Itu2019s just not good.  Now as for the coloru2026. I also have used St. tropez extra dark plenty and that has a green base, so I knew what to expect.  But, this violet formula  is not a shade for us fair skin girlies. Itu2019s far too cool and looks extremely unnatural.  It probably is*** a great shade for other people though.  I just canu2019t get over what happened to the formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes u dark but it was sooo patchy putting on!! Stuck to all my dry spots and I tried lotion and all.. idk :( may have to return now! Bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is 5 stars! However this was not my cup of tea.  It stayed sticky on me never tried down which sucked sleeping in and Iu2019m too pale for this shade when it was fading it looked freaking crazy! I couldnu2019t get it off either. So patchy girl it was! Extra dark color tho and for sure beautiful! Just not for me.. so bummed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is hands down the best self tanner Iu2019ve tried. Iu2019ll leave a pic which explains it all so you can see for yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the Ashley Graham one and was excited to try this one. It had a stronger scent that gave me a migraine and it wasnu2019t as dark as I thought it was going to be. Ended up returning bc the smell gave me such bad migraines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the St. Tropez brand. I always get a boost of confidence when I use their tanning products. This was my first time using this product in specific and I was gifted by St. Tropez. It is a much deeper tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this for beginner self-tanners. I tan dark naturally, but a family history of melanoma and lupus has me avoid sun like the plague. I love the tone and color of this tan, but you CANNOT skip prep with this tanne Iu2019m talking exfoliation and 2 days of moisturizing beforehand. If youu2019re willing to undergo the prep and moisturize afterwards, this is a great tan. My only critique would be that it is hard to remove completely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by st tropez, I love this tanning brand so much. This bronzing mouse will leave you so so tan and ready for summer time or to beat the winter blues. its easy to blend and leaves a very natural golden tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying I love St. Tropez products. As someone whou2019s skin tone blends in with paper, I self tan frequently and have tried them all. I LOVE the color this product gives. I usually use the Ashley graham collab; that runs move golden olive where as this product is definitely a true bronze. (I am very fair and learn warm). It really takes a lol of finesse to get this evenly blended but once you figure it out, itu2019s gorgeous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. Usually self tan products leave me looking very orange and splotchy but this one left me with a natural tan color. Additionally, I am usually bothered by the smell of different self tan products but this one smelt completely fine. Will definitely add to my routine. Very lucky I was gifted by StTropez

reviews.review_title: The deepest tan I have ever had
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by sttropeztan for my honest review but I have been a fan of St Tropez since 2011. Another great self tanner from St Tropez! This is the darkest tanner I have ever used and it gave me such a great tan. I am very fair and love a good deep tan, the mousse applied so easy and didnu2019t streak. It was definitely more concentrated so I had to be careful and use less in smaller areas. I love that you can rinse it off after 30 minutes for a quick subtle tan or 8 hours for the deepest tan. I left mine on for 4 hours and rinsed and it gave a great dark tan. As for scent itu2019s your pretty standard self tanner smell but wasnu2019t overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: st tropez supreme violet bronzing mousse was a JOURNEY. from the horrified look of the application process to the BEAUTIFUL bronzed beauty that came after the first wash.. i have mixed feelings about this tanner. while it gave me the most beautiful bronze the first couple days, it also has been washing off very spotty and turning more orange imo. maybe thatu2019s user error though! the tan applied very harshly and didnu2019t feel like it rubbed in/blended easily at all. i was so nervous despite the fact that i spent so long applying it to be sure it was even. i would highly recommend this if you have an event to tan for as i said the first days are just BEAUTIFUL. but itu2019s not ideal to be a weekly self tan to me. gifted by st tropez

reviews.review_title: Darker than original formula but trickier to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from St. Tropez in exchange for my honest review. I have tried the original St. Tropez bronzing mousse and compared to this one, this one definitely gives a deeper tan. At first I was nervous about the color because the guide color gave my skin a grey tint. But it developed nicely and looked natural. I like to put this on before bed and wash it off in the morning. The application was a little trickier than the original formula. I had to really blend and be sure I didn't have any streaks. If you are looking for a darker tan than the original bronzing mousse, this is a good option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I bought this, there were 400 5-star reviews and all were incentivized. I took one for the team and ordered this to see if it really lived up to the hype. I have used St. Tropez products in the past, and the Ashley Graham collab was my favorite.   So now to this product. It goes on super streaky and you really have to rub it in a lot. You definitely need a mitt to apply. The bottle says leave on for 1 hr and rinse for a light tan, and 8 hrs for a full, olive shade. I tried the 1 hr first, and it gave a pretty nice, subtle tan. The next day I did the full 8 hrs and it was noticeably darker. I wouldn't really say this gave me an olive tone, though. For me (I have a naturally olive complexion) it was more sun-kissed bronze.   One thing I didnt love is that if you have even an inkling of stubble anywhe, the color picks up on alll those little pores. If you're Italian like me and your hair grows minutes after you shave, you may experience this problem, too.   Overall, I'd say this is decent. I'll definitely use the rest of the bottle but may try a different product next time.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s a trust the process product! But so worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted to me by St. Tropez this brand has been my favorite self tanner brand for a decade, was super excited to try this. It felt a bit dark for full body so I use it to contour my face I apply it before bed and let it develop til the next morning itu2019s a game changer! Tried again for full body after reading the other reviews and YES it looks a bit scary initially but washes off to the more gorgeous tan I have ever had!!

reviews.review_title: Looks great on my olive-toned skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This self tanner was gifted by St. Tropez, and I love it! The color payoff is beautiful, and it leaves a really natural result. It looks a bit scary when you first apply it (the color grade is DARK) but it develops beautifully and looks great when itu2019s washed off. It doesnu2019t transfer at all which I love. Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This tan went on very dark and streaky at first. I was scared that it was going to turn out exactly like how it went on, BUT once I washed it off it looked like a nice beautiful tan. reviews.review_title: The tan Iu2019ve always wanted! No orange just TAN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by St.Tropez - This is the perfect dark olive tan I have been wanting for so long! It gave me a very beautiful olive color no orange/greenish tan! My favorite part is that I can wear this for 8 hours to achieve the deepest color or rinse it off in as little as 30minutes-1 hour to achieve a pretty glow (I go the full 8 but I will utilize this in a pinch) ! I always appreciate a tinted tanning foam opposed to clear so I know where I already applied during application to get a streak free even tan, that even gives me a bit of instant color gratification as well. I always have a hard time with tanning foams being drying but this was actually hydrating so it felt really nice to apply without any tugging on the skin. I really love the way it has faded over the coarse of about a week, usually I get a large white patch under my breast area where tans rub off and it looks crazy but this one faded out pretty evenly so itu2019s not looking super uneven before my next tanning application. It did last a while which i was quite happy about, tanning foams usually come off me pretty quickly because I do a body shower every single day with a loofah and body wash!  St.Tropez has been a go to tanning brand of mine for a long time and I was really excited to try out and see how the new supreme violet mousse looks, overall I really loved this and I will be repurchasing this supreme violet mousse instead of their dark bronzing mouse which I usually use. I finally found the darkest natural olive tan I can use at home that compares to or even tops tanning salon spray tans! (I think I love this more than the dark Venetian spray tan in the versa booth from the tanning salon & I was obsessed with those lol) 10/10 from me, if your thinking about purchasing just do yourself a favor and get it, spring/ summer is right around the corner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be the first person to admit I'm not super into self-tan, but this product defied all expectations. I've  even tried others from the same brand, but this one is absolutely the best. It doesn't have any orange undertone that I can detect, so it looks natural. I was a bit worried since it said olive tan on the bottle that it would look strange on me because I have more neutral undertones, but it's perfect. I also really appreciate that it doesn't have a chemical smell. I've tried it overnight (for the full 8 hours) and for 30 minutes (then rinse as the bottle says) and I didn't smell anything crazy either time. One thing to keep in mind is the tan is deeper when left for the full eight hours, but the 30-minute hack will definitely work in a pinch! This is also the most even self-tan I've ever experienced. I don't see any weird spots, even on my ankles/feet/knees. I was so pleasantly surprised with the results that I ended up taking a photo and sending it to multiple people. They all loved the color of the tan too! Highly recommend. I was gifted by sttropez, but these are my honest thoughts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #gifted_by_St. Tropez   Being an enthusiast of tanning products, I find that achieving tan skin greatly boosts my self-confidence.  I've tried oodles of liquid tan products, and when I was gifted a St. Tropez Self Tan Supreme Violet Bronzing Mousse, I was more than ecstatic.   What sets this tanner apart from all the others is the color that you'll achieve.  You're results will be a natural, deep, stunning olive tan.  It has a unique violet base that balances the tone of your skin to reach those gorgeous results.   In my experience, the color achieved was truly remarkable and stands out as the best I have ever used.   The application is easy, but you definitely need an application glove.  The drawback that I can say is that it's sticky after applying it.  You can wash it off in 30 mins but waiting 8 hrs will bring you the deepest results.  I put on an old shirt and sweatpants and waited the full 8 hr.   Upon application the color will be a quite intense, keep in mind you need to shower off the excess leaving you with a beautiful, healthy, streak-free golden tan.  It is scented, however it's very light, pleasant and dissipates fast.  In my experience, the tan lasted for about 5 days and faded evenly, except for the hands which lighten faster due to frequent washing.   I recommend this to all self tanners looking for that beach ready, natural olive, gorgeous tan.

The tan developed over 3-6 hours post rinse and impressively lasts. At $48, it might be more pricey but SO WORTH  it compared to UV sessions or spray tans. Overall, if you're after a long lasting, natural olive tan, St.Tropez Self Tan Supru00eame Violet won't disappoint!!

reviews.review_text: New favorite as far as results go! Just make sure you put on some black clothes if youu2019re leaving it on for 8 hours. It will transfer to clothing. I have tried it with just doing the 30 minutes on and then rinse, that is my favorite result. I am very fair skinned and OCD about SPF. I never get very dark naturally. reviews.review_text: Gifted by st tropez tan As an avid self-tanner, I recently tried the Supreme Violet Bronzing Mousse, and I must say, I'm impressed. Unlike other self-tanners that fade within days, the Supreme Violet Bronzing Mousse held up remarkably well, maintaining its color for over a week with proper care. However, it's worth noting that the scent, while pleasant initially, can become slightly overpowering as the tan develops. Additionally, for those with very fair skin, the violet undertones may appear too dark, so a patch test is advisable. Overall, I highly recommend the Supreme Violet Bronzing Mousse for anyone looking for a high-quality self-tanner that delivers long-lasting, streak-free results with a beautiful violet undertone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by st tropez   The St Tropez bronze mouse is by far the most heavy duty self tanner Iu2019ve ever used. I actually consider myself a home self tanning connoisseur. Without using a glove or mitten I have perfected application to hands and feet. However, this one took me by surprise. Now this is designed to provide a natural deep olive tan, so definitely would suggest for those with a deeper natural skin tone who wish to accentuate and get that deep, Sunkissed glow. It is suggested to use a mitten for application leave on for 8 hours, and then rinse. The foam is lightweight and the scent is amazing. Self tanner doesnu2019t always smell very nice but this one is delightful. Such a pretty fragrance. I caution you do need to move very fast with this product as it stains the skin right away. Or at least with me and I am pretty fair. I was nervous about transfer to clothing, so slept with this product on overnight on dark sheets. There is no way I could go out in public with this tanner on my skin upon immediate application. Once I rinsed, it was definitely very dark, and it streaky. I think for someone not as fair as I this would be a great option. Also, now that I understand how this works, I think I could have a more successful application, The quality is impeccable and the tan really lasts. The downside to me is how quickly it dries and I did find that there was transfer on objects and clothing.

reviews.review_title: Goes on easy, leaves you bronzed and glowing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the St. Tropez Supru00eame Violet Bronzing Mousse (gifted by St. Tropez), and let me tell you, I am beyond impressed. As someone with sensitive skin, I'm always cautious about trying new products, but this bronzing mousse proved to be gentle and non-irritating.  First off, let's talk about the results. The bronzed and golden glow it gave my skin was absolutely stunning. It looked natural and radiant, without any hint of orange. Plus, the color lasted impressively wellu2014I've taken multiple showers since applying it, and the color hasn't faded one bit.  One thing that really stood out to me was the scent. Unlike other tanning products that often have a strong, yeasty odor, this one had a much more pleasant scent. It was subtle and didn't linger uncomfortably, which I appreciated. Applying the mousse was a breeze. It went on smoothly and evenly, without any streaks or patches. What's more, it dried surprisingly quickly, which meant I could go about my day without feeling sticky or waiting around for it to set.  After wearing it for the day and washing it off, I was thrilled to find that there were no streaks left behindu2014a common issue I've encountered with other self-tanners. The evenness of the color was impressive, and it looked just as good after washing it off as it did when I first applied it.  Overall, I can't recommend the St. Tropez Supru00eame Violet Bronzing Mousse enough. It delivers beautiful, long-lasting results without any of the drawbacks typically associated with self-tanning products. Whether you have sensitive skin like me or simply want a flawless bronzed look, this mousse is definitely worth trying.

It is a bit sticky after being applied, just FYI. Gifted for free from St. Tropez but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_text: Gifted By Saint Tropez **Review: St. Tropez Self Tan Bronzing Mousse** After trying out the St. Tropez Self Tan Bronzing Mousse, I can confidently say it's a game-changer in the world of self-tanning. The mousse texture glided smoothly onto my skin, allowing for easy, streak-free coverage. It dried quickly, which meant I could get dressed without worrying about it transferring onto my clothes. What truly sets this self-tanner apart is its natural-looking results. Instead of an orangey hue, it gave me a gorgeous, sun-kissed glow that looked like I had just returned from a weekend in St. Tropez. The color developed gradually over a few hours, leaving me with a believable tan that lasted for days. I also appreciated the hydrating properties of this formula. Unlike other self-tanners that can leave your skin feeling dry and tight, the St. Tropez mousse left my skin feeling soft and moisturized. Overall, I highly recommend the St. Tropez Self Tan Bronzing Mousse to anyone looking for a reliable, streak-free self-tanning option. With its easy application, natural-looking results, and long-lasting color, it's become a staple in my beauty routine. Say hello to a sun-kissed glow, courtesy of St. Tropez!
